casebody.data:
99-0557 (La. 4/23/99)

BANQUE DE DEPOTS v. BOZEL MINERACAO E FERROLIGAS. No. 99-C-0557. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: De Ferroligas, Companhia P.; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of St. Bernard 34th Judicial District Court Div. “D” Number 63-589, 64-833; to the Court *883of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-0742

Denied.

JOHNSON, J. not on panel.
